ai.summary: A scenic 10.3 km hike through farmland and woodlands in the UK, combining open field paths with shaded forest trails for a varied, moderate-paced walk.
ai.terrain_summary: Terrain combines flat farm tracks, gravel paths, and woodland trails. Expect uneven surfaces, occasional mud, short gentle ascents, and crossing gates or stiles along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Weather can change quickly in rural areas, so wear sturdy waterproof footwear and bring layered clothing. Livestock may be encountered on farm tracks; keep dogs under control and close gates behind you. Follow waymarkers and stay on official paths; respect private property. Be prepared for mud and uneven surfaces, and carry a map or offline navigation. Mobile signal may be patchy; tell someone your route and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Layers of clothing and a weatherproof jacket
Map and/or offline navigation (or GPS device)
Hat and sunscreen (for sun) or warm hat and gloves (for cold days)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal for this 10.3 km walk, though it remains doable year-round with proper footwear and caution.

seo.title: Farm and Forest Walk – 10.3 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 10.3 km Farm and Forest Walk in the UK. A moderate terrain route through farmland and woodland, suitable for hikers seeking countryside scenery.
